text: find the colour name from a hexadecimal colour code
i want to find the name of a colour from the hexadecimal colour code.
When i get a hex colour code i want to find the most matching colour name.
for example for the code #c06040 , how to find out if it is a shade of brown, blue or yellow ?.
so that i can find the colour of an object in the image without human intervention.
Is there any relation between the hexadecimal code of the shades of a colour?
please give some sample code if there is any.
